Producer: Brunson Green, Peter Heslop, Charlie Mason, Rick McCallum, Justin Moore-Lewy, David Oyelowo
Rating: PG-13 (Racial Epithets|A Scene of Sensuality|Some Language)
Synopsis: In the 1940s, Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana shocks the world when he marries a white woman from London.
Title: A United Kingdom
